content-text.text:
Push the Limits!

XumaK offers high-quality training for all levels from authors to architects.  Whether just beginning or at an advanced level, XumaK has the expertise to take you further.

social.links: [{"url":"http://www.twitter.com/TeamXumaK"\,"text":"Follow Us On Twitter"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/twitt.png"},{"url":"http://www.facebook.com/XumaK"\,"text":"Follow Xumak on Facebook"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/face.png"},{"url":"http://www.linkedin.com/company/2036835?trk=pro_other_cmpy"\,"text":"Follow Xumak on LinkedIn"\,"imageURL":"/etc/designs/xumak/clientlib/images/linkedin.jpg"}]

textimage.description:
You now have an experienced development team and they're looking to really push their implementation to the limits. Let XumaK show them the way with our Advanced Developer Workshop. These workshops are taught by our highly-trained and experienced professionals, all of whom participate in real-world implementations around the world. It's time to let XumaK show you just how powerful you can be.

This workshop focuses on many aspects of a "full development" such as the integration of your CQ5 code into a third party repository such as SVN and analyzing usage and dispersing given code into each developers CQ instance and sending given code to an integration development server of CQ. Furthermore, we will review the usage of advance frameworks such as Velocity, covering advance querying of CQ5 content and preparing you for the content migration process from other systems into CRX. Some of the topics to be covered within this hand-on workshop are noted below. A student attending this workshop should have completed the Official AdobeÂ® Developer Training.
textimage.heading: Advanced CQ Developer Workshop
